title: CodeCompanion.nvim workspace configuration file
description: Schema for a CodeCompanion.nvim workspace configuration file. A workspace is a collection of groups which relate to functionality in a codebase

version.description: Version of the workspace file. Allows teams to know if there have been any changes to the file

system_prompt.description: The default system prompt that's sent to an LLM when a workspace group is selected

groups.description: A group is a collection of objects from the data object in this schema, which relate to features and functionality in the codebase

system_prompt.description: The system prompt specific to the group that is shared with an LLM when the group is selected

remove_config_system_prompt.description: Remove CodeCompanion's default system prompt when this group is selected?

data.description: List of data IDs which make up the group
Objects in the codebase that are referenced in groups

type.description: A file shares the whole contents of an object in the codebase. A symbol shares a symbolic outline (via Tree-sitter) of an object in the codebase. A url shares the entire contents of a webpage.

path.description: Path to the resource. Could be a filepath in the case of a file or symbol type. Or a url in the case of a url type

opts.description: Optional settings for the data object

auto_restore_cache.description: If the object is a URL, should its  cached data be automatically restored?
